title: Block reacing heigh h0 after collision

content.prompt: Which of the following quantities is the same immediately after the collision and at the instant the block reaches height h0 ?

choices.label: Linear momentum of the clay-block system
Angular momentum of the clay-block system about the top of the string
Total mechanical energy of the clay-block system
Total mechanical energy of the clay-block-Earth system

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
